#labels Phase-Implementation
Instructions for preparing an afrimesh development environment under Ubuntu

= Dependencies =

Run as required:

  * httpd: 
  {{{
  apt-get install apache2
  }}}
  * radius:   
  {{{
  apt-get install freeradius freeradius-mysql
  }}}
  * mysql:  
  {{{
  apt-get install mysql-server mysql-client mysql-common libmysql++-dev
  }}}
  * net-snmp:  
  {{{
  apt-get install snmp
  apt-get install libsnmp-dev 
  }}}
  * curl:
  {{{
  apt-get install curl
  }}}
  * wget:
  {{{
  apt-get install wget
  }}}
  * libuci:
  {{{
  wget http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libuci-0.7.3_i386.deb
  dpkg -i libuci-0.7.3_i386.deb
  }}}
  * libjson:
  {{{
  wget http://afrimesh.googlecode.com/files/libjson-0.8_i386.deb
  dpkg -i libjson-0.8_i386.deb
  }}}


----

== Package Build Environment ==

  * pbuilder
  {{{
  sudo apt-get install pbuilder devscripts  fakeroot
  sudo apt-get install dput mini-dinstall # if you need a local repository
  }}}
  * configure:
  {{{
  sudo pbuilder create --distribution <ubuntu_version (e.g. hardy)> \
        --othermirror "deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu <ubuntu_version> main restricted universe multiverse"
  }}}
  * build:
  {{{
  make packages-linux
  }}}
  * update pbuilder environment
  {{{
  sudo pbuilder update
  }}}
  * use pbuilder-dist (of the ubuntu-dev-tools) to have several different pbuilder setups for different Ubuntu releases.
  * read:
  {{{
  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PbuilderHowto
  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PackagingGuide/Complete
  }}}
